name: Mast Labs
tag_list: web, cloud, mobile, security, multimedia, gamification, authentication, identity, audio, ecommerce, social
overview:
Mast Labs is a global engineering R&D group focused on the innovation of bespoke, disruptive technology in the multimedia, security, interactive and mobile/e-commerce spaces for web, cloud and mobile. Servicing international clients with cutting-edge research, development, engineering, IP protection and licensing, Mast is changing the way content is created, secured, socialized, commercialized and experienced.

Staffed by engineers, scientists and executives from the likes of Sun Microsystems, Computer Associates, CitySearch, Oâ€™Reilly, Sony, MCI and Liberty Media, Mast has come to be known as a premiere software house servicing clients and initiatives through design, engineering, development and IP licensing. With partners and patrons from around the world, Mast Labs has global reach and impact in its market space.

With ties to the global banking, insurance, e-commerce, mobile, professional recording, film scoring, post-production, game design, Internet and digital content distribution industries, Mast has an ear to the ground and a firm feedback loop of advisors and insiders who help inspire, guide and validate our innovations. Generating over $1.2MM annual IP development revenue, Mast stays on the cutting edge of e-commerce, multimedia and security technology for the creation, commercialization, socialization and consumption arenas in web, cloud and mobile.
